definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Yin1 yue4 Xue2 yuan4
Zhong1 yang1 Yin1 yue4 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: She currently pursues her first year bachelor music degree in Haute Ecole de Musique de Genève.
sentences.chinese: 她现就读于日内瓦国立高等音乐学院，攻读学士学位。

sentences.english: The 20-year-old is a sophomore at the prestigious Royal College of Music in London.
sentences.chinese: 现在，他在久负盛名的伦敦皇家音乐学院就读二年级。

sentences.english: Liu Jian, Composer, Professor from Wuhan Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 刘健，作曲家，武汉音乐学院作曲系教授。

sentences.english: Rehearsals will be held at UC's College- Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 排练将在辛辛那提大学音乐学院里举行。

sentences.english: The story happened in New York a famous musicology courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 故事发生在纽约一所著名的音乐学院里。

sentences.english: Born into a musical family, Micheline graduated from the Paris Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 她出身于音乐世家，获得巴黎音乐学院授予的学位。

sentences.english: She is studying from professor Weimin Hu at the attached middle school of Sichuan conservatory of music.
sentences.chinese: 现就读中国四川音乐学院附中，师从胡惟民老师。

sentences.english: He Jie graduated from Sichuan Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 何洁毕业于四川音乐学院。

sentences.english: Watch below the film of a high status performance by the Royal Conservatoire The Hague in the Dutch Culture Centre.
sentences.chinese: 以下是海牙皇家音乐学院精彩的音乐会表演视频。

sentences.english: At the age of 11, she won first prize at the Paris Conservatoire.
sentences.chinese: 11岁时，她赢得巴黎音乐学院首奖。

sentences.english: He got his Licentiate, Trinity College London (LTCL) in Compositional Techniques in 1995.
sentences.chinese: 九五年考获英国圣三一音乐学院作曲技法高级文凭。

sentences.english: You don't drop out of Juilliard.
sentences.chinese: 你没有被茱莉亚音乐学院开除。

sentences.english: There are numerous schools of music and music departments in many universities.
sentences.chinese: 专门的音乐学院也很多，许多大学还设有音乐系。

sentences.english: Now he is the dean of the department of keyboard in Gnessin Institute.
sentences.chinese: 现为莫斯科格涅辛国立音乐学院键盘系主任。

sentences.english: Are you a graduate of a Conservatoire?
sentences.chinese: 你是一个音乐学院的毕业生？

sentences.english: Mr. Serkin currently teaches at Bard College Conservatory of Music and the Longy School of Music.
sentences.chinese: 塞尔金先生现任教于巴德音乐学院和隆基音乐学院。

pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 Yin1 yue4 Xue2 yuan4
Shang4 hai3 Yin1 yue4 Xue2 yuan4

definition: abbr. for 藝術學校|艺术学校/art school

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Wu3 dao3 Xue2 yuan4
